unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies can be a lifesaver, no? Especially after Diwali shopping! I once bought a saree from Mysore silk emporium, and the colour wasn't quite right in daylight. Luckily, they had a hassle-free return. Similar experience with Flipkart for electronics. Wish everyone had such policies like Tanishq’s exchange offer. Makes you feel secure, just like enjoying hot biryani on a rainy day!
